00033 
00034 #if defined(__AVR_ATmega168__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega88__)

00036 #elif defined(__AVR_ATmega168P__) || defined(__AVR_ATmega328P__) 
00037     #include "freebus-atmega168p.h"

00041

00054 #define SETPIN_IO1(val)         if(val)                                 \
00055                                 {                                       \
00056                                     IO1_PORT |= (1U<<IO1_PIN);          \
00057                                 }                                       \
00058                                 else                                    \
00059                                 {                                       \
00060                                     IO1_PORT &= ~(1U<<IO1_PIN);         \
00061                                 }
00062 #define GETPIN_IO1()            ((IO1_IN>>IO1_PIN) & 0x01)
00063 #define SET_IO_IO1(type)        IO1_DDR = (IO1_DDR & ~(1U<<IO1_PIN)) | (type<<IO1_PIN)
00064

00067                                     IO2_PORT |= (1U<<IO2_PIN);          \
00068                                 }                                       \
00069                                 else                                    \
00070                                 {                                       \
00071                                     IO2_PORT &= ~(1U<<IO2_PIN);         \
00072                                 }

00074 #define SET_IO_IO2(type)        IO2_DDR = (IO2_DDR & ~(1U<<IO2_PIN)) | (type<<IO2_PIN)

00142 #define SETPIN_PROG(val)        if(val)                                 \
00143                                 {                                       \
00144                                     PROG_PORT |= (1U<<PROG_PIN);        \
00145                                 }                                       \
00146                                 else                                    \
00147                                 {                                       \
00148                                     PROG_PORT &= ~(1U<<PROG_PIN);       \
00149                                 }
00150 #define GETPIN_PROG()           ((PROG_IN>>PROG_PIN) & 0x01)
00151 #define SET_IO_PROG(type)       PROG_DDR = (PROG_DDR & ~(1U<<PROG_PIN)) | (type<<PROG_PIN);\
00152                                 PROG_PORT = (PROG_PORT & ~(1U<<PROG_PIN)) | ((~type & 0x01)<<PROG_PIN)
00153                                 
00154 #define SETPIN_CTRL(val)        if(val)                                 \
00155                                 {                                       \
00156                                     CTRL_PORT |= (1U<<CTRL_PIN);        \
00157                                 }                                       \
00158                                 else                                    \
00159                                 {                                       \
00160                                     CTRL_PORT &= ~(1U<<CTRL_PIN);       \
00161                                 }
00162 #define GETPIN_CTRL()           ((CTRL_IN>>CTRL_PIN) & 0x01)
00163 #define SET_IO_CTRL(type)       CTRL_DDR = (CTRL_DDR & ~(1U<<CTRL_PIN)) | (type<<CTRL_PIN)
00164 
00165 #define SETPIN_EIBOUT(val)      if(val)                                 \
00166                                 {                                       \
00167                                     EIBOUT_PORT |= (1U<<EIBOUT_PIN);    \
00168                                 }                                       \
00169                                 else                                    \
00170                                 {                                       \
00171                                     EIBOUT_PORT &= ~(1U<<EIBOUT_PIN);   \
00172                                 }
00173 #define SET_IO_EIBOUT(type)     EIBOUT_DDR = (EIBOUT_DDR & ~(1U<<EIBOUT_PIN)) | (type<<EIBOUT_PIN)   
00174 
00175 #define GETPIN_EIBIN()          ((EIBIN_IN>>EIBIN_PIN) & 0x01)
00176 #define GETPIN_EIBOUT()         ((EIBOUT_IN>>EIBOUT_PIN) & 0x01)
00177 #define SET_IO_EIBIN(type)      EIBIN_DDR = (EIBIN_DDR & ~(1U<<EIBIN_PIN)) | (type<<EIBIN_PIN);\
00178                                 EIBIN_PORT = (EIBIN_PORT & ~(1U<<EIBIN_PIN)) | ((~type & 0x01)<<EIBIN_PIN)

00183 #define SETPIN_RES1(val)        if(val)                                 \
00184                                 {                                       \
00185                                     IO1_PORT |= (1U<<IO1_PIN);          \
00186                                 }                                       \
00187                                 else                                    \
00188                                 {                                       \
00189                                     IO1_PORT &= ~(1U<<IO1_PIN);         \
00190                                 }
00191 #define SETPIN_RES1_ON          RES1_PORT |= (1U<<RES1_PIN);
00192 #define SETPIN_RES1_OFF         RES1_PORT &= ~(1U<<RES1_PIN);
00193 #define GETPIN_RES1()           ((RES1_IN>>RES1_PIN) & 0x01)
00194 #define SET_IO_RES1(type)       RES1_DDR = (RES1_DDR & ~(1U<<RES1_PIN)) | (type<<RES1_PIN);\
00195                                 RES1_PORT = (RES1_PORT & ~(1U<<RES1_PIN)) | ((~type & 0x01)<<RES1_PIN)
00196 
00197 #define SETPIN_RES2_ON          RES2_PORT |= (1U<<RES2_PIN);
00198 #define SETPIN_RES2_OFF         RES2_PORT &= ~(1U<<RES2_PIN);
00199 #define GETPIN_RES2()           ((RES2_IN>>RES2_PIN) & 0x01)
00200 #define SET_IO_RES2(type)       RES2_DDR = (RES2_DDR & ~(1U<<RES2_PIN)) | (type<<RES2_PIN);\
00201                                 RES2_PORT = (RES2_PORT & ~(1U<<RES2_PIN)) | ((~type & 0x01)<<RES2_PIN)
